objects.description: Several transportation organizations in Ukraine have suffered from being infected by [Bad Rabbit](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Software/S0005), resulting in some computers becoming encrypted, according to media reports. (Citation: ESET Bad Rabbit Oct 2017)

external_references.description: Marc-Etienne M.Léveillé. (2017, October 24). Bad Rabbit: Not‑Petya is back with improved ransomware. Retrieved October 27, 2019.
